frontmatter.title: Create Context
frontmatter.description: Guide on how to create a context

internal.content:
---
title: Create Context
tabs: ['Usage', 'Docs']
description: Guide on how to create a context 
---

<PageDescription>

Create an instance of a *module* and make it available in the *context*.

</PageDescription>

### E.g.:

  ```ts
  import { createContext } from "@redux-mvc/core"

  const Page = createContext({
    module
  })(PageLayout)

  ```

To set the *globalContext* pass *GLOBAL_CONTEXT_ID*

  ```ts
  import { createContext, GLOBAL_CONTEXT_ID } from "@redux-mvc/core"

  const Page = createContext({
    module
    contextId: GLOBAL_CONTEXT_ID
  })(PageLayout)

  ```

frontmatter.title: Create Context
frontmatter.description: Guide on how to create a context

---
title: Create Context
tabs: ['Usage', 'Docs']
description: Guide on how to create a context 
---

<PageDescription>

Create an instance of a *module* and make it available in the *context*.

</PageDescription>

### E.g.:

  ```ts
  import { createContext } from "@redux-mvc/core"

  const Page = createContext({
    module
  })(PageLayout)

  ```

To set the *globalContext* pass *GLOBAL_CONTEXT_ID*

  ```ts
  import { createContext, GLOBAL_CONTEXT_ID } from "@redux-mvc/core"

  const Page = createContext({
    module
    contextId: GLOBAL_CONTEXT_ID
  })(PageLayout)

  ```
